column5: Hi all, I'm heading down to Port Rowan area on Saturday.  Or at least pretty close to it, we haven't decided yet.  Depends where the fishing is better really.  Going for some shore fishing.  Any ideas for spots??  Pier's etc??  I don't know the area at all so any advice would be great.
Check out this link for fishing reports on Long Point Bay: http://www.longpoint.on.ca/forum/default.asp
Not a lot of spots to shore fish down here.There is a pier and little park at the end of Main St. in Port Rowan and another pier you can fish in Port Dover about 30 min. away.
The only spots from shore are at the Old Cut in Long Point and the pier in Port Rowan. Not a lot of fish there right now though. Your best bet is to go to Port Dover  and try the pier and marina.

Thought that I read in a post before that they closed off the peir in Pt. Dover to the public - think it said that they were going to renovate it. Nautifish should be along here soon with the lastest - since its her home ground.  Don
